attributes.action: Condemn the Punishment of Freedom of Speech in Bahrain
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government should publicly & politically condemn & use their influence to free the prisoners held for protesting peacefully against their oppression in Bahrain & to discourage the continuing use of undue force [including tear gas & weapons, some of which were supplied by the UK] on the Bahraini peaceful protesters & on the Bahraini Shia community who are peacefully commemorating religious events.
